thread.title: As Investors Circle, Organized Labor Moves Into Digital Media
thread.title_full: As Investors Circle, Organized Labor Moves Into Digital Media - WSJ

author: Lukas I. Alpert
title: As Investors Circle, Organized Labor Moves Into Digital Media
text:
Earlier this month, when writers at Vice Media were emailing about the potential benefits of unionizing, one employee brought up company co-founder Shane Smith’s purchase of a $23 million mansion in Santa Monica, Calif., a house featured in “Beverly Hills Cop” and the HBO show “Entourage.”
“For next time [management] says they can’t afford to... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
